name: Android Workshop
venue: Chandigarh Group of Colleges, Kharar Banur Hwy, Sector 112, Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar, Punjab 140307
summery: The best way to end a week is by making it count. So DSC CGC presents you Android Weekend
description: The best way to end a week is by making it count. So DSC CGC presents you Android Weekend, a day dedicated to learning, exploring and utilizing the technology called Android.So if you are curious about technology, or is an Android developer or want to start with Android development, this is the perfect workshop for you.
